item.title: List files
item.description: Maybe you don’t need to visualize files. You just display a list of links (like an Apache2 server). Use a shortcode like the gallery template. Snippet: { {< list-files folder="files" >} } In order to display the shortcode above, additional spacing was necessary. The real shortcode should have braces without a middle space, like {{ and }}. (Note: This won’t work with Markdown files because they’re processed by Hugo.) pexels-allan-feitor-7555440.
